name: 炼金：虚空边域
description: 炼金：虚空边域预计共30张卡牌，将于2025年8月20日上线万智牌：竞技场。感谢轻脚翻译并制作中文卡图。

cards.name: Val, Marooned Surveyor
cards.text:
`Vigilance`
Whenever you `discover`, `investigate`, `scry`, `surveil`, or `seek` one or more cards, Val deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
cards.zhs_text:
`警戒`
每当你`倾探`，`探查`，`占卜`，`刺探`或`取出`一张或数张牌时，瓦尔向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。

cards.name: Thendar, the Overminer
cards.text:
`Menace`
Whenever a nonbasic land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, its controller `conjures` a card named `Wastes:0` onto the battlefield tapped.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more tapped creatures, destroy up to one target nonbasic land.
cards.zhs_text:
`威慑`
每当一个非基本地从战场进入坟墓场时，其操控者将一张名称为`荒野:0`的牌横置`幻变`进战场。
在你的结束步骤开始时，若你操控两个或更多已横置的生物，则消灭至多一个目标非基本地。

cards.name: Axavar, Fate Thief
cards.text:
Void - At the beginning of your end step, if a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn, discard a card, then `heist` target opponent's library.
`Warp` {B/R}
cards.zhs_text:
空洞～在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合有非地永久物离开战场或本回合有咒语跃迁，则弃一张牌，然后`偷窃`目标对手的牌库。
`跃迁`{B/R}

cards.name: Thought Partition
cards.text: Target opponent reveals all nonland cards in their hand. You may choose one of those cards. If you do, it `perpetually` becomes white and its mana cost `perpetually` becomes {5}.
cards.zhs_text: 目标对手展示其手上所有的非地牌。你可以选择其中一张牌。若你如此作，则其`永久`成为白色，且其法术力费用`永久`成为{5}。

cards.name: Worldweave
cards.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, `seek` a land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.
cards.zhs_text: 每当你施放生物咒语时，`取出`一张地牌并将它横置放进战场。
